name: Sphere (itch) (Adam BLC)
description:
2D indie Mobile Score-Based Game/Android

Starting in the middle of two red blocks, witch seem to spawn different enemies, you, a blue Sphere, try to avoid contact with them, while multiple blocks from the ground progressively become Spawn Red Blocks.

Enemies will explode after a certain lifetime, increasing the score by +1 for each enemy.

Enemy Types:

  • Walkers:Normal Following Enemies, always on ground, pretty fast, normal lifetime.
  • Jumpers:  They Jump at consistent hight, most common type, normal lifetime
  • Followers: They launch at you at high speed, indifferent about gravity, shorter lifetime.

Abilities:

  • SlowMotion: You are able to slow time for a couple of seconds after which yoy"d have to wait for a 6sec cooldown.
  • Clear Enemies: A power-up that Blocks might drop after they turn into spawn points, it destroys all enemies in scene but does not increase score.
  • Double Jump: Double jump at all time.
